content: **crocheted decorative flower in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-834 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** 9 cm in diameter **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 08 off white / 90 moss green 50 g colour 61 light taupe / 89 light sea green 1 flower weighs approx 8 g **accesories** silk ribbon for loop **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 22 double crochets in width and 22 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
